member.name: T:Databases_Project_03.Tests.UnitTest1
member.summary: Class for testing comparisons made between an indexed and a normal table.

member.name: M:Databases_Project_03.Tests.UnitTest1.ResultsTest
member.summary: Compare if results from indexed and non indexed table are equal and greater than zero.

member.name: M:Databases_Project_03.Tests.UnitTest1.WhereResultsTest
member.summary: Compare if results from indexed and non indexed table are equal and greater than zero when "where" condition is called.

member.name: M:Databases_Project_03.Tests.UnitTest1.PerformanceTest
member.summary: Check if indexed query is faster than non indexed.

member.name: M:Databases_Project_03.Tests.UnitTest1.ScanUsedTest
member.summary: Check which method (sequential scan or index) was used when queries were called.
